name: Oshiomah P. Oyageshio
title: Interdisciplinary Scientist
bio: I am a member of the Consortium on Asthma among African-ancestry Populations in the Americas (CAAPA), a collaborative effort to study genetic variation and its role in health among populations of African descent across the Americas.

education.description: Specialized in population genetics and bioinformatics

experience.description: Lead researcher on genetic variation studies in African-ancestry populations
